mimodek
Class Mimodek

java.lang.Object
  mimodek.Mimodek
All Implemented Interfaces:
controlP5.ControlListener
public class Mimodek
extends java.lang.Object
implements controlP5.ControlListener

Main class for Mimodek. Handles the initialization of environment, events from mouse and keyboard, events from the parent sketch. It basically wraps the details of Mimodek in a single object that the parent sketch can communicate with.

Author:
Jonsku

Method Detail

dispose

public void dispose()
Anything in here will be called automatically when the parent applet shuts down. for instance, this might shut down a thread used by this library. note that this currently has issues, see bug #183 http://dev.processing.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=183

size

public void size(int width,
                 int height)
Called when the applet sets it size(). Apparently there is a bug in Processing core and this method is not called automatically, thus for now the parent sketch should this method in its setup() method after a call to size().

Parameters:
width -
height -

controlEvent

public void controlEvent(controlP5.ControlEvent cEvent)
Specified by:
controlEvent in interface controlP5.ControlListener

reset

public void reset()
Call this method to reset Mimodek without quitting the program. WARNING: Every Mimos and the DLA will be lost!!

draw

public void draw()
Called after the parent sketch draw method. Note that it is possible to also do some drawing there, Mimodek won't erase anything but only draw over existing drawings.

post

public void post()
Called after the sketch is done drawing the frame. If needed, takes a snapshot of Mimodek and saves it in a PNG file

keyEvent

public void keyEvent(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
Key event handler.
KeyEffect
sSave current configuration to /data/Configurator/Configurator.xml
lLoad configuration from /data/Configurator/Configurator.xml
jSave DLA to mimodek.xml
kLoad DLA from mimodek.xml
fToggle image documentation on/off

Parameters:
e -
